mapper.select: select * from bi_number_trans t where t.classguid = #CLASSGUID# and t.fieldname = #FIELDNAME# and t.prestr = #PRESTR# and t.sufstr = #SUFSTR# and t.instanceguid= #INSTANCEGUID# and t.serialnolocation = #SERIALNOLOCATION#
mapper.insert:
insert into bi_number_trans (classguid, fieldname, prestr, sufstr, serialnolocation, serialno, instanceguid, fullnumber, isvalid, createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime)
values (#CLASSGUID:VARCHAR#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR#, #PRESTR:VARCHAR#, #SUFSTR:VARCHAR#,
#SERIALNOLOCATION:VARCHAR#, #SERIALNO:VARCHAR#, #INSTANCEGUID:VARCHAR#, #FULLNUMBER:VARCHAR#, #ISVALID:VARCHAR#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update: update bi_number_trans set serialno = #SERIALNO#, fullnumber=#FULLNUMBER#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# where classguid = #CLASSGUID# and fieldname = #FIELDNAME# and prestr = #PRESTR# and sufstr = #SUFSTR# and instanceguid= #INSTANCEGUID# and serialnolocation = #SERIALNOLOCATION#
